meanings.definition: An activity done regularly in one's leisure time for pleasure.
meanings.sent1: One of my hobbies is painting landscapes.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys reading as a hobby in her free time.
meanings.sent3: His hobby of collecting stamps keeps him busy and happy.
meanings.sent4: Exploring new hiking trails has become a hobby of mine.
meanings.sent5: The hobby of knitting brings her a sense of calm and accomplishment.

meanings.sent1: Cooking is one of her favorite hobbies.
meanings.sent2: Playing the guitar is a popular hobby among many people.
meanings.sent3: His unusual hobby of collecting vintage buttons always surprises guests.
meanings.sent4: Her hobby of gardening is like tending to a colorful, living canvas.
meanings.sent5: The hobby of birdwatching allows him to connect with nature in a unique way.
